hello.intro:
[Capital Challenge Horse Show](https://www.pgparks.com/event_list/capital-challenge-horse-show) runs September 24–October 5, 2025 at [Prince George Equestrian Center](https://www.pgparks.com) in Upper Marlboro, Maryland. A county-run complex connected to The Show Place Arena with a multi-ring footprint built for big fields. Expect an A-circuit pace and smooth ring-flow from schooling trips through finals; keep eyes on the warm-up ring, jog-strip, and vendor-row without losing time.

Upper Marlboro feels suburban and efficient, with quick hops to nearby retail clusters for off-barn resets. Early October brings mild air and crisp mornings—fresh footing underfoot and coffee steam in the cool. Competitors and crews move fast here; this guide trims errands so riders, trainers, and grooms stay focused.
hello.outro: Keep the week simple and sport-forward. I can book lodging, map one barn dinner, and prep essentials so you walk into Capital Challenge Horse Show ready to ride.
hello.cta: One message and it’s done. I’ll line up rooms, reservations, and essentials for a calm CAPC week.

stay.title: Where to Stay
stay.paragraph: For premium comfort, base at the [Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/wasgn-gaylord-national-resort-and-convention-center/overview/) or [The Hotel at The University of Maryland](https://www.thehotelumd.com). Prefer a quicker hop to the grounds? The [Courtyard by Marriott Largo Medical Center Drive](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/waslg-courtyard-largo-capital-beltway/overview/) keeps mornings simple.
stay.cta: Want it handled? I’ll lock rooms and sync confirmations.

items.name: The Hotel at The University of Maryland
Courtyard by Marriott Largo Medical Center Drive

dine.title: Dine
dine.am: Start at [First Watch](https://www.firstwatch.com) for AM fuel—light, fast, and reliable before jogs or schooling.
dine.dinner: After classes, book [Copper Canyon Grill](https://www.coppercanyongrill.com) for steaks and salads, slide to [Grace’s Steak & Seafood](https://www.gracesrestaurants.com) for surf-and-turf with sushi, or keep it eclectic at [Busboys and Poets Hyattsville](https://www.busboysandpoets.com).
dine.cta: I’ll map a barn-friendly dinner loop with quick reservations.

locale.title: Locale — Off-Barn
locale.paragraph: Reset with quick suburban comforts: short retail runs, a quiet coffee, or a brief green-space stroll between blocks. Keep it light so you’re ready for the next trip.

essentials.title: Essentials
essentials.paragraph: Groceries at [Giant Food](https://giantfood.com); pharmacy runs at [CVS Pharmacy](https://www.cvs.com); feed, bedding, and tack at [Southern States](https://www.southernstates.com); wheels from [Enterprise Rent-A-Car](https://www.enterprise.com); and golf carts via [Dever, Inc.](https://www.deverinc.com).
essentials.cta: I’ll pack a lean kit so nothing slows your rounds.

items.name: Giant Food Upper Marlboro
items.alt: Closest full-service grocery to the showgrounds.

items.name: CVS Pharmacy Upper Marlboro
items.alt: Full-service pharmacy in the same plaza as Giant.

items.name: Enterprise Rent-A-Car Largo
items.alt: Closest rental branch with SUVs and vans.

items.name: Dever, Inc.
items.alt: Golf cart rentals with delivery and pickup.
